name: BimFacts
0:
”Alexa open bim facts”
”Alexa ask bim facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell bim facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bim facts
des:
Ask for Bim Facts, and learn about what its history.

Bim Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Bim Facts" or "Alexa, open Bim Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
